Title: Algorithms for Quadtree Representation of Matrices
Body: Date: Wed, 20 Nov 1996 19:14:38 GMT Server: Apache/1.0.3 Content-type: text/html Content-length: 2791 Last-modified: Fri, 01 Dec 1995 21:56:56 GMT Algorithms for Quadtree Representation of Matrices Algorithms for Quadtree Representation of Matrices Description: Rather than decomposing matrices into rows, columns or tiny blocks, we decompose them recursively into quadrants.
